name: Border
description: A boundary between political entities defines territory and creates opportunities for control and taxation. The strategic importance makes it a focus for military and political activity, while the crossing points create opportunities for trade and espionage.
atmosphere: Invisible line marked by guard posts and boundary stones separates different territories while patrols maintain vigilant watch. Official crossing points control the flow of people and goods as political tensions simmer. The air carries authority and territorial disputes. Where different laws and cultures meet.
